text: dangsinkkeseo jeoege myeonglyeonghan geos-oeeneun geudeul-ege malhaji anihaess-eu ni naui junim-iyo neohuiui junim-in hananimman-eul gyeongbaehala hayeoss-eumyeo je ga geudeulgwa hamkke iss-eum-e jeoneun geudeul ege jung-in-i doeeossgo dangsin-i jeoleul seungcheonsikin hueneun dangsinkkeseo geudeul-eul jikyeobogo gyesinani dangsin-eun modeun geos-ui jung-in-isibnida
